page.title: 12Grampound Over 60's
page.content: This club is for the old people of the village.You have to be over 60 years of age before you can join.They meet twice a month on the first and third Thursdays.They meet in the village hall.Sometimes they go out on a coach trip to visit a beauty spot or another over 60s club.People come to the meetings to entertain them or tell them things.At Christmas they have a Christmas Dinner and sing carols and sometimes they go to see a pantomime in Plymouth.Some of the club go together on a summer holiday.There are a lot of people who go to this club because a lot of old people live in Grampound.They do a lot of talking.
